name: ID
description: A unique identifier for this structure element, used for referencing it from other elements or external sources.

name: Ref
description: Defines or references the lower-level PDF objects (content items) that represent the actual text or graphic content of this element.

name: A
description: An attribute dictionary providing additional layout or semantic attributes for this element. May reference a class map.

name: C
description: An array of class names associated with this element, which can link to further style or attribute definitions in a class map.

name: T
description: An optional text label or title for this structure element—can serve as a short descriptor (e.g., for a heading).

name: Lang
description: Identifies the primary language for the text in this element (e.g., 'en-US'), aiding in proper text processing and accessibility.

name: Alt
description: Provides alternative text describing the element’s content, primarily for accessibility (screen readers).

name: E
description: Contains expansion text used to clarify abbreviations, acronyms, or symbolic content within the element.

name: ActualText
description: Gives an exact text equivalent for non-textual or symbolic content, allowing screen readers to read it as plain text.

name: AF
description: An array of associated files or file specifications that relate to this structure element (e.g., attachments).

name: NS
description: Specifies a namespace identifier for custom attributes, enabling extensibility without conflicting with standard keys.

name: PhoneticAlphabet
description: Indicates the phonetic alphabet used for any phonetic text within the element (e.g., IPA).

name: Phoneme
description: Contains the phonemic representation of text for pronunciation guidance or linguistic analysis.
